name: Super Chain Crusher Horizon
description: Super Chain Crusher Horizon is the largest, longest, most incredible PC shooting game in history with a two-player mode that is revolutionary. And, it’s loaded with game modes that solve the problems had by most shoot ‘em ups.

reviews.review_text: Finally a game that utilizes the multimonitor setup properly, giving a lot of horizontal space for some old school arcade fun!
Neat, but this game is extremely slow and incredibly easy. Some of the concepts are great, I just wish I wasn't bored so quickly. Fun for a spin at $3, but I would be ticked at $15.
